comments.body: Add a note that - KRA service should be enabled to use this module.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@short_description: Manage FreeIPA vaults
description:
- Add, modify and delete vaults and secret vaults.
- KRA service should be enabled to use this module.
options:

comments.body:
Yeah, you need at least provide "cn" or "name" field:

```
      - name: '[IDM] Test IDM vault creation'
        ipa_vault:
            state: present
            name: 'vault_ansible_021'       <-- This one or the same with **cn** 
            description: 'test description field'
            vault_type: 'symmetric'
            ipa_host: 'ipa.example.com'
            ipa_user: 'admin'
            ipa_pass: 'XXXXXXX'
            validate_certs: False
            replace: False
        register: vault
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +113,117 @@
# Get vault info if already exists
- ipa_vault:
    name: vault01
    ipa_host: ipa.example.com
